title: Family
creator_credit: Wombat Productions, Inc. and Gene Feldman
brief_description: Focusing on a typical nuclear family living in semi-rural Connecticut farmland, the role of the family in contemporary society is reviewed here. Members of this and other families give their views on marriage and family life, some upholding traditional views and others expressing discontent with the established system.
